title: 200 Killed In Floods, Landslides In Nepal, Rescue Operations Continue
content: Search and rescue operations continued in Nepal for the third consecutive day on Monday after monsoon-induced floods and landslides killed more than 200 people in one of the worst rain-related disasters in the Himalayan nation in recent years.
summary: Search and rescue operations continued in Nepal for the third consecutive day on Monday after monsoon-induced floods and landslides killed more than 200 people in one of the worst rain-related disasters in the Himalayan nation in recent years.

title: Tesla Catches Fire Inside Florida Garage Flooded From Hurricane Helene
content: Officials advised people not to charge, drive, or store their EVs or E-bikes in their homes or garages.
summary: Officials advised people not to charge, drive, or store their EVs or E-bikes in their homes or garages.

title: Google Paid $2.7 Billion To Rehire AI Genius To Co-Lead Gemini: Report
content: Google re-hired its long-time researcher, Naom Shazeer, to co-lead its AI models in a $2.7 billion deal, the Wall Street Journal reported. Mr Shazeer quit Google in 2021 after being a part of the company for 21 years.
summary: Google re-hired its long-time researcher, Naom Shazeer, to co-lead its AI models in a $2.7 billion deal, the Wall Street Journal reported. Mr Shazeer quit Google in 2021 after being a part of the company for 21 years.

title: What Makes A Person Seem Wise? Various Cultures Differ, According To Study
content: We all admire wise people, dont we? Whether its a thoughtful teacher, a compassionate doctor, or an elder in the community, we recognise wisdom when we see it.
summary: We all admire wise people, dont we? Whether its a thoughtful teacher, a compassionate doctor, or an elder in the community, we recognise wisdom when we see it.

title: Singer-Songwriter Kris Kristofferson Dies At 88
content: Kris Kristofferson, who became one of the most influential American singer-songwriters of his time with works such as "Me and Bobby McGee," as well as becoming a successful actor, died Saturday at the age of 88, according to a family statement.
summary: Kris Kristofferson, who became one of the most influential American singer-songwriters of his time with works such as "Me and Bobby McGee," as well as becoming a successful actor, died Saturday at the age of 88, according to a family statement.

title: Why The Vance-Walz Debate Boils Down To Contrasting Versions Of Masculinity
content: Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance and Kamala Harris's vice-presidential pick Tim Walz -- set to debate each other Tuesday -- embody different versions of masculinity in an election that is dividing American men and women like never before.
summary: Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance and Kamala Harris's vice-presidential pick Tim Walz -- set to debate each other Tuesday -- embody different versions of masculinity in an election that is dividing American men and women like never before.

title: Frenchman On Mass Rape Trial Absent From Court For Being "Unwell"
content: Dominique Pelicot, 71, has been on trial since September 2 over raping and recruiting strangers to rape his heavily sedated wife Gisele for nearly a decade.
summary: Dominique Pelicot, 71, has been on trial since September 2 over raping and recruiting strangers to rape his heavily sedated wife Gisele for nearly a decade.

title: What To Expect From NATO's New Chief Mark Rutte?
content: Incoming NATO chief Mark Rutte brings new leadership this week to one of the world's most powerful-sounding roles -- helming the nuclear-armed Atlantic alliance.
summary: Incoming NATO chief Mark Rutte brings new leadership this week to one of the world's most powerful-sounding roles -- helming the nuclear-armed Atlantic alliance.

title: Investment Firm Fidelity Reduces Value Of Elon Musk's X By 79%
content: Global investment firm Fidelity has reduce the value of its holding in Elon Musk-run X (formerly Twitter) by a massive 78.7 per cent, which implies that the X social media platform is likely valued at just $9.4 billion.
summary: Global investment firm Fidelity has reduce the value of its holding in Elon Musk-run X (formerly Twitter) by a massive 78.7 per cent, which implies that the X social media platform is likely valued at just $9.4 billion.

title: "All Goals" Set For Ukraine Will Be Achieved, Says Russian President Putin
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday vowed that Moscow would accomplish all goals it has set for itself in Ukraine, in its third year of conflict.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday vowed that Moscow would accomplish all goals it has set for itself in Ukraine, in its third year of conflict.

title: Hamas Confirms Death Of Its Leader In Lebanon In Israeli Airstrike
content: Palestinian militant group Hamas said its leader in Lebanon was killed Monday in a strike on the country's south, as official media reported a strike on a Palestinian refugee camp.
summary: Palestinian militant group Hamas said its leader in Lebanon was killed Monday in a strike on the country's south, as official media reported a strike on a Palestinian refugee camp.

title: "Only Available Card Is Atom Bomb": Iran's Hardliners Amid Mideast Tensions
content: Iran's ultra-hardliners are demanding the closure of the Strait of Hormuz and the development of a nuclear bomb in response to the recent killing of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah.
summary: Iran's ultra-hardliners are demanding the closure of the Strait of Hormuz and the development of a nuclear bomb in response to the recent killing of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah.

title: Explained: What Is Marburg Virus That Has Killed 6 In This African Country
content: At least six people have died in Rwanda's first-ever outbreak of the deadly Marburg virus. Sabin Nsanzimana, the country's health minister, confirmed that most of the victims were healthcare workers in a hospital intensive care unit.
summary: At least six people have died in Rwanda's first-ever outbreak of the deadly Marburg virus. Sabin Nsanzimana, the country's health minister, confirmed that most of the victims were healthcare workers in a hospital intensive care unit.

title: Over 13,000 Immigrants Convicted Of Homicide Roaming Free In US: Report
content: More than 13,000 immigrants, convicted of homicide either in the United States or abroad, are currently living freely in America, according to the country's Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).
summary: More than 13,000 immigrants, convicted of homicide either in the United States or abroad, are currently living freely in America, according to the country's Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).

title: Saudi Arabia Voices "Great Concern" For Lebanon Amid Israeli Strikes
content: Saudi Arabia expressed its "great concern" at the conflict in Lebanon on Monday, calling for the country's "sovereignty and territorial integrity" to be respected.
summary: Saudi Arabia expressed its "great concern" at the conflict in Lebanon on Monday, calling for the country's "sovereignty and territorial integrity" to be respected.

title: Ukraine Claims Over 650,000 Russian Soldiers Killed Since War Began In 2022
content: Russia has lost 651,810 troops since the onset of its full-scale invasion of Ukraine on February 24, 2022, the General Staff of Ukraine's Armed Forces said.
summary: Russia has lost 651,810 troops since the onset of its full-scale invasion of Ukraine on February 24, 2022, the General Staff of Ukraine's Armed Forces said.

title: Drunk US Man Kills Friend After Talks Over Quitting Alcohol Turn Violent
content: After the attack, Allen texted a local handyman for cleanup assistance. However, the handyman discovered the bloodied body and instead contacted Southampton Town Police.
summary: After the attack, Allen texted a local handyman for cleanup assistance. However, the handyman discovered the bloodied body and instead contacted Southampton Town Police.

title: BTS' Suga Fined $11,500 For Drunk Driving On E-Scooter
content: Suga rode the scooter and tripped when parking at night. He made an apology for the incident calling it "careless and wrong behaviour".
summary: Suga rode the scooter and tripped when parking at night. He made an apology for the incident calling it "careless and wrong behaviour".

title: UK Police Officer Sacked For 'Spanking' 12-Year-Old Girl
content: The child was known to Benson, and the incidents, which occurred while he was off duty, were found to have a sexual element, the force added.

title: Austria's Far-Right Unsure About Forming Government Despite Historic Victory
content: As jubilant Austrian far-right supporters celebrated their party's historic win in Sunday's national elections with beers, they knew forming a government would not be easy.
summary: As jubilant Austrian far-right supporters celebrated their party's historic win in Sunday's national elections with beers, they knew forming a government would not be easy.
